metadata.title: CVE-2020-35728 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.8 mishandles the interaction between serialization gadgets and typing, related to com.oracle.wls.shaded.org.apache.xalan.lib.sql.JNDIConnectionPool (aka embedded Xalan in org.glassfish.web/javax.servlet.jsp.jstl).

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
